discription.title: Women's Dark Navy Skirt Suit
discription.description: Made in Italy from a linen composition this dark navy skirt suit features a double-breasted blazer and maxi-length skirt. The blazer is cut to a straight fit with subtle shaping to the back and an exaggerated peak lapel for a feminine feel. The blazer features contrast 'Signature Stripe' lining trims for a distinctive touch. The maxi skirt is the perfect transitional piece for seasonal styling. Complete with partial viscose lining, the skirt features twin side pockets, button fastened pockets to the back, concealed zip fly, belt loops, and contrast button fastening to the waistband, effortlessly combining functionality and style.

components.name: Women's Dark Navy Double Breasted Linen Blazer
details: 'Signature Stripe' partial lining to the interior

details: 'Signature Stripe' tape detailing to the interior

discription.title: Women's Sea Green Wool Suit
discription.description: Made in Portugal from a rich wool hopsack composition, this sea-green suit features a single-button blazer and wide-leg trousers. The blazer has jetted pockets, a contrast lining, and four button cuffs. The trousers have a pleated front, soft viscose lining, and angled side pockets.

discription.title: Women's Coral Wool Suit
discription.description: Made in Portugal from a rich wool-hopsack cloth, this coral suit is perfect for adding a subtle pop of colour to any outfit. The blazer features a double-breasted fastening and flap pockets, is complete with contrast lining, and three button cuffs. The trousers showcase a cropped length. Features include pleated detail, tonal stitching, zip fly fastening.

discription.title: Women's Dusty Rose Wool Suit
discription.description: Made in Portugal from a rich wool hopsack composition, this dusty rose suit features a single-button blazer and slim-fit trousers. The blazer has jetted pockets, a contrast lining, and four button cuffs. The trousers feature concealed side pockets, an additional back pocket for added practicality, and an asymmetrical button fastening for a unique touch of style.

fit.description: is relaxed through the body. is cut for a close fit through the body.

discription.title: Women's A Suit To Travel In - Black Wool Double Breasted Blazer
discription.description: Made in Italy from a luxe wool crease-resistant composition, this black blazer features a double-breasted fastening. Cut to a straight fit with subtle shaping to the back and an exaggerated peak lapel for a feminine feel. The blazer features a contrast lining and 'Signature Stripe' trims.

fit.description:
- Straight-Fit is tailored with a clean silhouette through the body
- Subtle shaping to the back
- Exaggerated peak lapel for a feminine feel

- Height 5’ 10’’ / 177.5cm
- Waist 24.5”/ 62cm

discription.title: A Suit To Travel In - Women's Dark Navy Wool Travel Blazer
discription.description: Made in Italy as part of the Paul Smith 'A Suit To Travel In' collection, this dark navy one button blazer is constructed using a high-twist yarn to create a quick recovery, crease-resistant 100% wool-twill cloth; providing a versatile and highly-practical piece of tailoring.

fit.description:
Straight-Fit travel blazer is cut for a boxy-fit that finishes at a longer length that ends around the hips and has thin shoulder pads for a more casual and refined look.
- Single vent
fit.model_info:
- Model wears a size M
- Height 5’ 11’’ / 181cm
- Bust 32’’ / 81 cm
- Waist 24”/ 60cm

discription.title: Women's Buttercup Yellow Wool Waistcoat
discription.description: Made in Italy from a rich wool composition, this buttercup yellow waistcoat offers versatile styling options, whether paired with matching tailored pieces or worn with jeans for a more laid-back look. Complete with a contrast five-button closure, the waistcoat features a subtle rear vent, faux pockets at the front, and a luxurious viscose lining.

discription.description: Elevate your outerwear this transitional season with this camel trench coat crafted from luxurious Loro Piana 'Green Storm System' wool. discription.title: Women's Terracotta Suede Jacket
discription.description: This terracotta jacket, crafted from rich suede, offers a sleek, streamlined design enhanced by subtle brand details. With a concealed zip-fastened placket for a clean look, along with a press-stud fastening at the collar for added versatility. The jacket is designed with belt loops at the hem and press-stud closure pockets for both style and functionality. Finished with a contrasting viscose lining, this statement jacket is the ideal transitional piece, blending style and practicality for a standout addition to your wardrobe.

details.title: Press stud fastening to the top of placket
Rich suede construction for structured fit

size_fit.fit_description: Regular-Fit is relaxed through the body

discription.title: Women's Straight-Fit Laser 'Swirl' Jeans
discription.description: These straight-fit jeans, crafted from organically grown cotton with added stretch, offer both comfort and style. The distinctive laser 'Swirl' design adds a unique flair. Featuring a classic five-pocket design, the jeans also boast a tan 'Happy' logo waistband patch and branded hardware. Finished with a zip fly, they blend timeless design with modern details. Perfect for everyday wear, these jeans are a versatile addition to any wardrobe.

fit.description: Comfortable, classic silhouette that maintains an even width from hip to ankle, Features a regular rise that sits at the natural waist, Designed with a touch of stretch for ease of movement while maintaining shape

components.name: Women's Straight-Fit Laser 'Swirl' Jeans
details: Logo button and zip fly fastening

discription.title: Women's Wool Navy Knitted Roll Neck Sweater
discription.description: Made from a wool blend with a slight stretch this navy roll-neck sweater is constructed in lightweight knit. This sweater is complimented with a ribbed roll neck, a straight hem, and sleeve cuffs with contrast sheer trims infused with glitter thread.
